sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core';

@Component({
  selector: 'app-permission',
  templateUrl: './permission.page.html',
  styleUrls: ['./permission.page.scss'],
  standalone:false
})
export class PermissionPage implements OnInit {

constructor() { }

  ngOnInit() {
  }
  formData = {
    name: '',
    nameSecond: '',
    date: '',
    startTime: '',
    endTime: '',
    nightDuty: '',
    purposeToVisit: '',
    approverName: 'CHETTIAPPAN .V',
  };
}
<ion-header [translucent]="true">
  <ion-toolbar >
<ion-buttons slot="start">
  <ion-back-button defaultHref="/home"></ion-back-button>
</ion-buttons>

    <ion-title>Permission</ion-title>
  </ion-toolbar>
</ion-header>

<ion-content [fullscreen]="true" class="ion-padding permission-form-content">
  <ion-header collapse="condense">
    <ion-toolbar>
      <ion-title size="medium">Permission Request</ion-title>
    </ion-toolbar>
  </ion-header>

  <form #onduttyForm="ngForm">

    <!-- Employee Code -->
    <ion-item>
      <ion-label position="stacked">Employee Code</ion-label>
      <ion-input 
        [(ngModel)]="formData.name" 
        name="name" 
        placeholder="EGR998" 
        required>
      </ion-input>
    </ion-item>

    <!-- Name -->
    <ion-item>
      <ion-label position="stacked">Name</ion-label>
      <ion-input 
        [(ngModel)]="formData.nameSecond" 
        name="nameSecond" 
        placeholder="ARAVIND G" 
        required>
      </ion-input>
    </ion-item>

    <!-- Date -->
    <ion-item>
      <ion-label position="stacked">Date</ion-label>
      <ion-datetime-button datetime="permDate"></ion-datetime-button>
      <ion-modal keepContentsMounted="true">
        <ng-template>
          <ion-datetime
            id="permDate"
            presentation="date"
            [(ngModel)]="formData.date"
            name="date">
          </ion-datetime>
        </ng-template>
      </ion-modal>
    </ion-item>

    <!-- Start Time -->
    <ion-item lines="none">
      <ion-label position="stacked">Start Time</ion-label>
      <ion-datetime-button datetime="startTime"></ion-datetime-button>
      <ion-modal keepContentsMounted="true">
        <ng-template>
          <ion-datetime
            id="startTime"
            presentation="time"
            [(ngModel)]="formData.startTime"
            name="startTime">
          </ion-datetime>
        </ng-template>
      </ion-modal>
    </ion-item>

    <!-- End Time -->
    <ion-item lines="none">
      <ion-label position="stacked">End Time</ion-label>
      <ion-datetime-button datetime="endTime"></ion-datetime-button>
      <ion-modal keepContentsMounted="true">
        <ng-template>
          <ion-datetime
            id="endTime"
            presentation="time"
            [(ngModel)]="formData.endTime"
            name="endTime">
          </ion-datetime>
        </ng-template>
      </ion-modal>
    </ion-item>

    <!-- Night Duty -->
    <ion-item>
      <ion-label position="stacked">Night Duty</ion-label>
      <ion-radio-group [(ngModel)]="formData.nightDuty" name="nightDuty">
        <ion-item lines="none">
          <ion-label>Yes</ion-label>
          <ion-radio slot="start" value="yes"></ion-radio>
        </ion-item>
        <ion-item lines="none">
          <ion-label>No</ion-label>
          <ion-radio slot="start" value="no"></ion-radio>
        </ion-item>
      </ion-radio-group>
    </ion-item>

    <!-- Reason -->
    <ion-item>
      <ion-label position="stacked">Reason</ion-label>
      <ion-textarea 
        [(ngModel)]="formData.purposeToVisit" 
        name="purposeToVisit"
        rows="3">
      </ion-textarea>
    </ion-item>

    <!-- Approver Name -->
    <ion-item>
      <ion-label position="stacked">Approver Name</ion-label>
      <ion-input 
        [(ngModel)]="formData.approverName" 
        name="approverName"
        value="CHETTIAPPAN .V">
      </ion-input>
    </ion-item>

    <ion-button expand="block" class="submit-button">Submit</ion-button>
  </form>
</ion-content>
